Articles.Content: I was just wondering if there is any tool in MechJeb that allows you to kill the velocity? I know you do it by burning retrograde, but just asking, because it seems like there is nothing MJ can't do these days.

Translatron -> SURF -> check 'kill horizontal speed' and make descent speed 0 -> Execute.

If I'm right (and I usually am), that'll kill all velocity relative to the body you're orbiting.
Apparently there is nothing MJ can't do (good for my kerbals )

I just downloaded it. I'm probably not going to use it very much... but we'll see

I'm more efficient than the computer, but I'll be able to multitask better. And I've heard you can hover...
